name: intermediate-azure-static-web-apps
description: --- page_type: sample languages:   - javascript   - typescript products:   - azure functions description: 'Apps that can be used with as a starting point for some MS Learn Modules.' urlFragment: 'https://github.com/MicrosoftDocs/mslearn-staticwebapp' ---

scripts.start: concurrently "cd angular-app && rimraf node_modules package-lock.json dist && npx npm-check-updates -u && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npm run start" "cd react-app && rimraf node_modules package-lock.json dist && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npm run start" "cd vue-app && rimraf node_modules package-lock.json dist && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npm run serve" "cd svelte-app && rimraf node_modules package-lock.json dist && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npm run dev"
